meanings.definition: To remove someone from a list of friends on a social networking website.
meanings.sent1: She unfriends people who don't talk to her online.
meanings.sent2: He unfriends those who post too many cat pictures.
meanings.sent3: After she unfriends him, he sends her a friend request again.
meanings.sent4: Unfriending someone can sometimes lead to misunderstandings.
meanings.sent5: Remember to unfriend politely if you need to clean up your friend list.

meanings.definition: People who have been removed from a list of friends on a social networking website.
meanings.sent1: The unfriends were surprised to see they were no longer connected.
meanings.sent2: She felt sad when she saw her unfriends list growing.
meanings.sent3: The unfriends group decided to start their own social network.
meanings.sent4: Being on the unfriends list made him rethink his online behavior.
meanings.sent5: The unfriends category can sometimes include former close friends.
